review: My husband visited the doctor and it went well for him. when in my case ** *** ******* I visited almost more than 25 times and my treatment went for 4 months for ****** root canal issue. intially all went ok however i started facing pain in my tooth so visited and in this scenario ideally doctor and their assistant try to help patient but to my surprise they got rude and assistant behavior was exceptionally bad with lot of attitude. * ***** **** ** ** ******* ***** *** ***** *** **** ** ***** *** ***** *** **** ******** Highly disappointed.
